metadata.title: James Ross - Staff Software Engineer
metadata.description: Staff Software Engineer with 18 years building game systems that scale to millions. View my career as git commits.
metadata.author: James Ross

hero.name: James Ross
hero.title: Staff Software Engineer
hero.subtitle: Game Infrastructure & Engine Architecture
hero.tagline: I build game infrastructure that scales‚Äîfrom custom MMO engines to data platforms processing billions of player events. 18 years of turning complex technical problems into player experiences that millions love.
hero.experience: 18 years building game infrastructure that scales. From custom MMO engines to ML platforms processing billions of player events.

experience.description: Led feature development for cross-platform racing MMO. Built custom telemetry systems and multiplayer infrastructure.
Built telemetry and ML pipelines processing billions of player events. Created predictive systems for player behavior.
Remote game development consulting for studios worldwide.
Built AAA mobile games generating $1B+ revenue. Created core infrastructure for real-time strategy games.
Developed mobile F2P games reaching millions of players.
Shipped episodic adventure games on multiple platforms.
Contributed to Guild Wars franchise development and live operations.

gitMind.name: Git Mind
gitMind.description: Revolutionary R&D platform that uses Git as a neural substrate for distributed AI development. Pioneering the use of version control systems as computational frameworks for emergent intelligence.

universalCharter.name: Universal Charter
universalCharter.description: Open framework for ethical AI governance and human-AI collaboration. Establishing principles for responsible AI development in gaming and beyond.
universalCharter.impact: Setting standards for ethical AI in gaming

mindUcal.name: MIND-UCAL License
mindUcal.description: Machine Intelligence Non-Derivative Universal Charter Aligned License. A new software license designed for AI-assisted development that protects both human and AI contributions.

gitScrolls.name: GitScrolls
gitScrolls.description: Knowledge preservation system using Git for long-term storage of human wisdom and AI insights. Building the foundation for intergenerational knowledge transfer.

sections.title: The Journey Begins
sections.content: Every great story starts with a single line of code. Mine began at ArenaNet in 2007, fresh out of DigiPen with dreams of building worlds that millions would explore.

sections.title: First Commit: AAA Games
sections.content: At ArenaNet, I learned that game development isn't just about code‚Äîit's about crafting experiences. Working on Guild Wars taught me the importance of performance, scale, and the magic that happens when technology serves creativity.

sections.title: The Mobile Revolution
sections.content: When mobile gaming exploded, I rode the wave. At Kabam and Machine Zone, I helped build games that redefined what was possible on a phone. We weren't just making games; we were creating new ways for people to connect.

sections.title: Building an Empire at Ember
sections.content: As Principal Engineer at Ember Entertainment, I led the charge on a cross-platform racing MMO. Here, I combined everything I'd learned: scalable infrastructure, real-time multiplayer, and the art of making complex systems feel effortless to players.

sections.title: The MMO Challenge
sections.content: MMOs are the ultimate test of engineering prowess. Thousands of players, real-time interactions, persistent worlds‚Äîit's like conducting a symphony where every instrument is played by someone on the other side of the planet.

sections.title: Current Chapter: Innovation
sections.content: Today, I'm exploring the intersection of AI and game development. Projects like Git Mind and GitScrolls aren't just technical experiments‚Äîthey're glimpses into the future of how we'll build and experience interactive worlds.
